name: Odyssey X
tag_list: skill-gaming, gaming, games-for-money, game-of-skill, game-for-cash, cash-prizes
overview:
Become immersed in a virtual racing world where the sole purpose is to â€˜race to wealthâ€™. Racers can join tournaments and activities to win credits and real prizes. The credits that are won from these tournaments can be cashed out for real monetary value. This incentive will give the racer a chance to live their dreams not only in a video game but in real life even after credits are cashed out.

Odyssey X will feature an ever-expanding virtual world. This world will begin with the lower portion of Manhattan and will continue to grow as new regions, highway infrastructure and major landmarks are added. Odyssey X will consist of tons of dealerships, tune shops, and tournaments for the racer to choose from.

Odyssey X is an online game of skill that requires a member to use their own skill to gain profits. Odyssey X has eliminated the factor of chance. The â€˜practice loungeâ€™ will feature free races for â€˜fakeâ€™ credits. It is highly recommended to practice here first. The â€˜career modeâ€™ features the main world and tournaments. Here is where you can race for â€˜real creditsâ€™ and prizes. A racer must be over the age of 18 and live in a jurisdiction that allows skilled gaming in order to join this lounge.
